"Hunter":
"Hunter is a class that uses \"Guard\" and \"Step\" to evade enemy attacks and deal massive damage back to them with \"Counters\".

These are some of the Class Skills you can acquire as a Hunter:"

"\"Massive Hunter\" is an Active Skill that reduces damage taken and nullifies knockback for a set time when used.

Register it to your Subpalette so you can use it when fighting powerful enemies."
"<yellow>\"Photon Art Avenge\"<c> boosts the damage of any PA (Photon Art) if you get hit by an enemy attack at the moment that you use it."
